definitions.definition: During the time that something is happening, often specifically in a different place.
examples: There was a party going on downstairs. Meanwhile , I was reading a book.

definitions.definition: During an intervening time; from now until a future time.
examples: We’re going on holiday next month; meanwhile , keep working on the project.

definitions.definition: In contrast to aspects previously mentioned.
examples: Some songs on the album are beautiful. Meanwhile , others are quite forgettable.

main_definition: During the time that something is happening, often specifically in a different place.
secondary_definitions: During an intervening time; from now until a future time.
In contrast to aspects previously mentioned.
